mapper.sql: p.id, p.tips_title, p.tips_content, u.user_name,d.doc_name,d.doc_url, p.create_time, p.update_time,p.user_id
mapper.select: select p.id, p.tips_title, p.tips_content, u.user_name,GROUP_CONCAT(d.doc_name) as doc_name, p.create_time, p.update_time,p.user_id FROM car_biz_supplier_tips p LEFT JOIN car_biz_tips_doc d on p.id = d.tips_id INNER JOIN car_adm_user u on p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE 1=1 AND p.status=1 group BY p.id ORDER BY p.update_time DESC
